subject: Shipping update request #SSN5865
description_text:
Hello,

I’m writing to check on the status of my Simsonn Plus X pedal order. I was
expecting a shipping notification, but it looks like it hasn’t been shipped
yet.

Could you please let me know the current status and when I can expect it to
ship?

My order number is: #SSN5865

Thank you for your help, I appreciate the update.

Best regards,

Tijmen Vonk
